t: What Is a Teen Login? - Amazon Customer Service
s: A teen login allows teens (aged 13 to 17) to shop and share payment methods and Prime benefits with adults in an Amazon Household.

t: Removing a Teen Login from an Amazon Household - Amazon Customer Service
s: Teen Logins are available to teens ages 13-17 years. Teens (18+) are eligible for their own regular Amazon account.
